article: trying to unblock obstacles to a cease-fire in the congo war , president thabo mbeki was on sunday hosting a meeting with the leaders of uganda and rwanda which back rebels fighting to overthrow congo president laurent kabila .
abstract: mbeki tries to sort out congo rebel rivalry
